summary: This mod adds a dagger, with which you can bring Dead People back to life almost forever, by just cutting them with it. The dagger can also be destroyed at the enchantment table, to use the enchantment on any other weapon!
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: The enchantment can now be used on other weapons by destroying the dagger at the enchanting table!

Mara\'s Tool:
It\'s my first mod.

Note, that the revived People will just act like they lived before, so they won\'t follow or help you(depending on which NPC you are reviving)

The dagger can be found at Windhelm, in the Palace of Kings, laying on the strategic map.

INSTALL:
Just copy Mara\'s_Tool.esp to your Skyrim/Data directory.(for example C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data)

UNINSTALL:
Delete Mara\'s_Tool.esp from your Skyrim/Data folder.
author: AutGamer96
